title: VoicePen - AI Note Taker
description:
Say goodbye to traditional note-taking with VoicePen!
Record and transcribe speech into text: from short memos to long lectures and meetings.
Let AI turn recordings into easy-to-read notes, summaries, study materials, and more!
Save watch time by creating summaries for YouTube videos and podcasts.
Seamlessly works natively on all your Apple devices: iPhone, iPad, and Mac.
